s: They tell me only to remove the users from the brand registry. Which from what I take from that, doesn't delete the brand from Brand registry itself, only the access to the users.

After repeated attempts to deal with the age old problem of brand theft on amazon we have decided to quit Amazon to protect our Brand. We have ended all 1600 listing and we have no current piggy backers on any of our listings. I am registered in amazons brand registry (which is fairly pointless)Â ...

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: My brand has been removed by Amazon
s: My brand has been removed by Amazon for nearly three months, during which time I have submitted a POA and passed the brand video review. However, so far Amazon has not restored my brand and deleted a listing under that brand, which has brought great risks and losses to my operations.

t: How to Remove Items From Amazon Storefront
s: November 22, 2017 - How to Remove Items From Amazon Storefront. If you no longer want to offer a certain product, Amazon provides two options for removing items from your storefront. You can choose to close the listing, which removes the item from your storefront but does no

t: What happens when I delete a listing
s: I created a generic listing that ... inventory runs out, does it delete it completely or am I handing it over to my competitor. The images used in the listing were all mine. Thanks ... Once a listing exists it is permanent- this is how Amazon works....

t: How to remove a brand from Amazon brand Registry
s: November 7, 2022 - If you are looking for How to remove a brand from Amazon brand Registry. You are right to place an amazon seller forum for this type of information.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund.
